metadata.title: Scrum Master as a Service: Banking Organization's Scalable Agile Capability
metadata.overview: A commercial banking organization struggling with inconsistent Scrum Masters from multiple contracting firms achieved scalable agile capability through Eliassen's Scrum Master as a Service solution. The unified team approach delivered consistent practices, minimal ramp-up time, and the ability to rapidly scale agile delivery across the organization.

email.subject: Scrum Master as a Service Success: Banking Organization's Agile Transformation
email.body:
When a commercial banking organization was struggling with inconsistent Scrum Masters from multiple contracting firms, they were creating minimal measurable impact and considering eliminating the Scrum Master position entirely.

Their existing approach lacked unified practices, consistent methodology, and the ability to scale agile delivery across their development teams.

**Our Enterprise Agility team delivered a comprehensive solution:**

• **Unified team of experienced Scrum Masters** who understood the organization's goals and practices
• **Aligned common approach** across all development teams with consistent methodology
• **Scalable Scrum Master capability** ready for rapid deployment across the organization
• **Minimal ramp-up time** with team readiness and consistent standards
• **Ability to rapidly scale** agile delivery without the overhead of managing individual contractors
• **End-to-end service management** handling sourcing, integration, and delivery excellence

**The key differentiator:** Unlike administrative coordinators, our Scrum Masters function as team development experts who create psychological safety, drive team excellence, and deliver measurable business results.

**The business impact:** The client went from considering elimination of the Scrum Master role to having a scalable capability that delivers consistent value across their development teams.

This solution provides flexible resource management with the ability to scale support up and down based on changing business priorities without long-term commitments or administrative burden.

Would you be interested in a 20-minute discussion about how Scrum Master as a Service could transform your agile delivery capabilities?
